titles.title: A bill to correct the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States as it applies to certain electric toothbrushes and parts thereof.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9870)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on certain electric toothbrushes and their parts.
